specials.name: Bad Execution
specials.text: This ATK is not affected by weakness or resistance.

specials.name: Confusion
specials.text: Before your Opponents next ATK they flip a coin. If Heads their active pokemon takes 2 damage before ATKing.

specials.name: Paralyzed
specials.text: Before your Opponents next ATK they flip a coin. If tails their ATK does nothing.

specials.name: Burn
specials.text: Your Opponents Pokemon takes 1 damage in between both turns.

specials.name: Recharging
specials.text: This ATK does +3 damage.Your Pokemon does nothing on your next turn.

specials.name: Perish Song
specials.text: Your Opponents Pokemon is cursed and will faint in 5 turns from this ATK. Your Pokemon cannot switch out or ATK until this effect ends.

specials.name: Infatuation
specials.text: Your Opponents Pokemon's next ATK does -1 damage.

specials.name: Power Boost
specials.text: This ATK does +2 damage. Your Opponents Pokemon's next ATK does +3 damage.

specials.name: Splash
specials.text: Flip a coin. If Heads, this ATK does +2 damageIf tails, this ATK does nothing.

specials.name: Primed
specials.text: This ATK does +1 damage.

specials.name: Seeded
specials.text: This ATK does +1 damage. You gain +1 HP.

specials.name: Roll-Out
specials.text: For every consecutive ATK with 'Roll-Out' add +1 damage to your next ATK.

specials.name: Self Destructive
specials.text: This ATK does +2 damage. Your Pokemon takes 1 damage.

specials.name: Roost
specials.text: Your pokemon heals for +2 health.

specials.name: Reversal
specials.text: On this battles first ATK, if your speed is slower than your opponent this ATK does +5 damage.

specials.name: Sleep
specials.text: Flip a coin. If Heads, your Opponent's Pokemon is now asleep.

specials.name: Rest
specials.text: This ATK does +2 damage. Flip a coin, If Tails, this Pokemon is now asleep.

specials.name: Lackluster
specials.text: This ATK does -2 damage. This Pokemon heals for 3 HP.

specials.name: Joker
specials.text: Flip a coin. If Heads deal +3 damage. If Tails, this Pokemon takes 5 damage.

specials.name: Froggy
specials.text: After this ATK does damage. Switch out this pokemon.

specials.name: Oblivious Rage
specials.text: If this Pokemon took damage last turn this ATK does nothing. Otherwise this ATK does +3 damage.

specials.name: Payback
specials.text: If this Pokemon took damage last turn this ATK does +2 damage.

specials.name: Glass Cannon
specials.text: This ATK does +4 damage. If this Pokemon took damage last turn this ATK does -2 damage instead.

specials.name: Strong Affliction
specials.text: If this Pokemon is affected by a status condition, this ATK does +2 damage.

specials.name: Down But Not Out
specials.text: If this Pokemon has 5 or less HP left this ATK does +4 damage.

specials.name: Execute
specials.text: If your Opponents Pokemon has 4 or less HP left, this ATK Defeats that Pokemon.

specials.name: Biding Time
specials.text: This ATK does +2 damage. This ATK cannot be used if your Opponents Pokemon has 10 or more HP left.

specials.name: First Strike
specials.text: If your Opponents Pokemon has no damage, this ATK does +4 damage.

specials.name: Watcher
specials.text: This ATK does +2 damage. If your Opponents Pokemon has no damage, this Pokemon cannot use this ATK.

specials.name: Chilling Rein
specials.text: If this Pokemon is affected by a status condition, this ATK does +3 damage.

specials.name: Lucky
specials.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This ATK does +1 for every heads.

specials.name: Unlucky
specials.text: Flip a coin until you get heads. This ATK does -1 for every tails.

specials.name: Greedy
specials.text: If this Pokemon has a Held Item, this ATK does -2 damage. Otherwise this ATK does +2 damage.

specials.name: Shadow Strike
specials.text: This ATK does +3 damage if your opponent's Pokemon is affected by a status condition.

specials.name: Pacifist
specials.text: If this Pokemon does not have a Held Item, this ATK does +2 damage.

specials.name: Vengeful Spirit
specials.text: If your Benched Pokemon were damaged during the last turn, this ATK does +3 damage.

specials.name: Thunderclap
specials.text: Flip a coin. If Heads, this ATK does +2 damage and your opponent's Pokemon is paralyzed. If Tails, this ATK does 1 damage.

specials.name: Crippling Bite
specials.text: If this ATK does more than 5 damage, your next ATK does -2 damage.

specials.name: Poison
specials.text: Your Opponents pokemon takes 1 damage in between both turns.
